Package project2

Class AccountDatabase

java.lang.Object
project2.AccountDatabase
public class AccountDatabase
extends java.lang.Object
Stores account types in database, searches for account in database, add account to database, removes account from database, print by last name and by date
Author:
FERRIS HUSSEIN, TANKPINOU PADONOU

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    AccountDatabase()
    This method initiates the account database as an array of size 5

    boolean add​(Account account)
    Add account to account database array
    boolean debitHelp​(Account account, java.lang.Double val)

    Deposit money to specified account

    Print database by date open in ascending order

      This method initiates the account database as an array of size 5

  • Method Details

    • debitHelp

      public boolean debitHelp​(Account account, java.lang.Double val)
      This method is a helper account to 'debit' specified value from balance Primarily used for Checking and Savings account
      Parameters:
      account - , account that withdrawal will occur
      val - , value to be withdrawn
      Returns:
      truth value of whether withdrawal was successful or not

    • add

      public boolean add​(Account account)
      Add account to account database array
      Parameters:
      account - , account to be added
      Returns:
      truth value if account was successfully added

    • remove

      public boolean remove​(Account account)
      Remove account to account database array
      Parameters:
      account - , account to be removed
      Returns:
      truth value if account was successfully removed

    • deposit

      public boolean deposit​(Account account, double amount)
      Deposit money to specified account
      Parameters:
      account - , account where money will be deposited
      amount - , value to be deposited
      Returns:
      truth value if deposit was successful or not

    • withdrawal

      public int withdrawal​(Account account, double amount)
      Withdraw money of specified account, use primarily for money market accounts
      Parameters:
      account - , account where money will be withdrawn
      amount - , value to be withdrawn
      Returns:
      return 0: withdrawal successful, 1: insufficient funds, -1 account doesn’t exist

    • printByDateOpen

      public void printByDateOpen()
      Print database by date open in ascending order
